Package com.anotherservice.rest.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IResponseFormatter
    This interface defines the two methods that will format the Handler response to be sent to the client.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Request
    This class is part of the REST service and handles the requests in order to extract requires information and parameters.
    Responder
    This class is part of the REST service and handles the response sent to the client.
    It relies on the Config key : com.anotherservice.rest.core.formatParameter (if not set, Responder.defaultFormatter is used).
    Router
    This class loactes the proper Handler for the REST service and execute() it.
    It relies on the Config key : com.anotherservice.rest.core.helpActionPath (if not set, "help" is used as value).
    ServiceMonitor
    This class is the base loader for REST services.
    Servlet
    This is the main REST service Servlet.
